languages.text: "А кто ты еще? Наследни{mf|к|ца} трона династии, младший потомок. Возможно, ты привык{mf||ла}, что при встрече с тобой падают ниц, но для меня ты лишь дитя".
"What else should I call you? The heir to the dynasty's throne, a young descendant. You may have grown used to people prostrating themselves before you, but to me, you are just a child."
languages.original_text: "А кто ты еще? Наследни{mf|к|ца} трона династии, младший потомок. Возможно, ты привык{mf||ла}, что при встрече с тобой падают ниц, но для меня ты лишь дитя".

traits.locale_text: "What else should I call you? The heir to the dynasty's throne, a young descendant. You may have grown used to people prostrating themselves before you, but to me, you are just a child."
"What else should I call you? The heir to the dynasty's throne, a young descendant. You may have grown used to people prostrating themselves before you, but to me, you are just a child."
"What else should I call you? The heir to the dynasty's throne, a young descendant. You may have grown used to people prostrating themselves before you, but to me, you are just a child."
"What else should I call you? The heir to the dynasty's throne, a young descendant. You may have grown used to people prostrating themselves before you, but to me, you are just a child."
"What else should I call you? The heir to the dynasty's throne, a young descendant. You may have grown used to people prostrating themselves before you, but to me, you are just a child."
"What else should I call you? The heir to the dynasty's throne, a young descendant. You may have grown used to people prostrating themselves before you, but to me, you are just a child."

languages.text: «¿Qué debería llamarte, si no? Eres {mf|el|la} joven hereder{mf|o|a} al trono de la dinastía. Puede que te hayas acostumbrado a que la gente se arrodille ante ti, pero, para mí, no eres más que un{mf||a} crí{mf|o|a}».
languages.original_text: "What else should I call you? The heir to the dynasty's throne, a young descendant. You may have grown used to people prostrating themselves before you, but to me, you are just a child."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué debería llamarte, si no? Eres {mf|el|la} joven hereder{mf|o|a} al trono de la dinastía. Puede que te hayas acostumbrado a que la gente se arrodille ante ti, pero, para mí, no eres más que un{mf||a} crí{mf|o|a}».

languages.text: “否则我还能怎么称呼你呢？你是王朝的继承人，是王朝年轻的子嗣。或许你已经习惯了其他人跪倒在你面前，但在我眼里，你仅仅是个孩子而已。”
languages.original_text: "What else should I call you? The heir to the dynasty's throne, a young descendant. You may have grown used to people prostrating themselves before you, but to me, you are just a child."

traits.locale_text: “否则我还能怎么称呼你呢？你是王朝的继承人，是王朝年轻的子嗣。或许你已经习惯了其他人跪倒在你面前，但在我眼里，你仅仅是个孩子而已。”

languages.text: 「他になんと呼べばいい？王朝の王位継承者の若い末裔よ。あなたは、自分の前に民がひれ伏すことに慣れて育ったかもしれないが、私にとってはただの子どもだ」
languages.original_text: "What else should I call you? The heir to the dynasty's throne, a young descendant. You may have grown used to people prostrating themselves before you, but to me, you are just a child."

traits.locale_text: 「他になんと呼べばいい？王朝の王位継承者の若い末裔よ。あなたは、自分の前に民がひれ伏すことに慣れて育ったかもしれないが、私にとってはただの子どもだ」

languages.text: "Wie sollte ich Euch denn sonst nennen? {mf|Der Thronerbe|Die Thronerbin} der Dynastie, {mf|ein junger Nachfahre|eine junge Nachfahrin}. Ich mögt Euch daran gewöhnt haben, dass die Leute vor Euch auf die Knie fallen, aber für mich seid Ihr nur ein Kind."
languages.original_text: "What else should I call you? The heir to the dynasty's throne, a young descendant. You may have grown used to people prostrating themselves before you, but to me, you are just a child."

traits.locale_text: "Wie sollte ich Euch denn sonst nennen? {mf|Der Thronerbe|Die Thronerbin} der Dynastie, {mf|ein junger Nachfahre|eine junge Nachfahrin}. Ich mögt Euch daran gewöhnt haben, dass die Leute vor Euch auf die Knie fallen, aber für mich seid Ihr nur ein Kind."

languages.text: « Parce que c'est ce que vous êtes. L'{mf|héritier|héritière} du trône dynastique, {mf|le plus jeune représentant|la plus jeune représentante} de la lignée. Vous avez peut-être l'habitude qu'on se prosterne devant vous, mais à mes yeux, vous n'êtes guère qu'{mf|un|une} enfant. »
languages.original_text: "What else should I call you? The heir to the dynasty's throne, a young descendant. You may have grown used to people prostrating themselves before you, but to me, you are just a child."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que c'est ce que vous êtes. L'{mf|héritier|héritière} du trône dynastique, {mf|le plus jeune représentant|la plus jeune représentante} de la lignée. Vous avez peut-être l'habitude qu'on se prosterne devant vous, mais à mes yeux, vous n'êtes guère qu'{mf|un|une} enfant. »

languages.text: "Başka ne diyebilirim ki? Hanedanlık tahtının vârisi, soyun genç bir mensubu. Önünde secde edilmesine alışmış olabilirsin ama benim gözümde küçük bir çocuksun."
languages.original_text: "What else should I call you? The heir to the dynasty's throne, a young descendant. You may have grown used to people prostrating themselves before you, but to me, you are just a child."

traits.locale_text: "Başka ne diyebilirim ki? Hanedanlık tahtının vârisi, soyun genç bir mensubu. Önünde secde edilmesine alışmış olabilirsin ama benim gözümde küçük bir çocuksun."
